docs.snippet: A member of the Belarus delegation who carried a Russian flag at the Paralympic opening ceremony to support his country's near-neighbor that is banned from the competition was stripped of his accreditation, the International Paralympic Committee (...
docs.lead_paragraph: A member of the Belarus delegation who carried a Russian flag at the Paralympic opening ceremony to support his country's near-neighbor that is banned from the competition was stripped of his accreditation, the International Paralympic Committee (IPC) said on Thursday.

docs.snippet: Goodell has used the N.F.L.’s personal conduct policy to penalize players for a long list of offenses. Players’ union representatives say he is corroding trust....
docs.lead_paragraph: Goodell has used the N.F.L.’s personal conduct policy to penalize players for a long list of offenses. Players’ union representatives say he is corroding trust.
docs.abstract: Many football players and fans view NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell's aggressive use of league's personal conduct policy as out of line, particularly in light of Goodell's refusal to appoint independent arbitrator to hear appeals.
